verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees. <S%H4609><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his afflictions: <S%H6031><s%>
How <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and vowed <S%H5087><s%> unto the mighty <S%H46><s%> God of Jacob; <S%H3290><s%>

Surely <S%H518><s%> I will not come <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of my house, <S%H1004><s%> nor <S%H518><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> my bed; <S%H6210><s%> <S%H3326><s%>
I will not <S%H518><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> sleep <S%H8153><s%> to mine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> or slumber <S%H8572><s%> to mine eyelids, <S%H6079><s%>
Until <S%H5704><s%> I find out <S%H4672><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> a habitation <S%H4908><s%> for the mighty <S%H46><s%> God of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Lo, <S%H2009><s%> we heard <S%H8085><s%> of it at Ephratah: <S%H672><s%> we found <S%H4672><s%> it in the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the wood. <S%H3293><s%>
We will go <S%H935><s%> into his tabernacles: <S%H4908><s%> we will worship <S%H7812><s%> at his footstool. <S%H1916><s%> <S%H7272><s%>
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> into thy rest; <S%H4496><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and the ark <S%H727><s%> of thy strength. <S%H5797><s%>
Let thy priests <S%H3548><s%> be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with righteousness; <S%H6664><s%> and let thy saints <S%H2623><s%> shout for joy. <S%H7442><s%>
For thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%> sake <S%H5668><s%> turn not away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H408><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of thine anointed. <S%H4899><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> unto David; <S%H1732><s%> he will not <S%H3808><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> it; Of the fruit <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%> will I set <S%H7896><s%> upon thy throne. <S%H3678><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> thy children <S%H1121><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> and my testimony <S%H5713><s%> that <S%H2097><s%> I shall teach <S%H3925><s%> them, their children <S%H1121><s%> shall also <S%H1571><s%> sit <S%H3427><s%> upon thy throne <S%H3678><s%> forevermore. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5703><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> Zion; <S%H6726><s%> he hath desired <S%H183><s%> it for his habitation. <S%H4186><s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> is my rest <S%H4496><s%> forever: <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5703><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> will I dwell; <S%H3427><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have desired <S%H183><s%> it.
I will abundantly bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H1288><s%> her provision: <S%H6718><s%> I will satisfy <S%H7646><s%> her poor <S%H34><s%> with bread. <S%H3899><s%>
I will also clothe <S%H3847><s%> her priests <S%H3548><s%> with salvation: <S%H3468><s%> and her saints <S%H2623><s%> shall shout aloud for joy. <S%H7442><s%> <S%H7442><s%>
There <S%H8033><s%> will I make the horn <S%H7161><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> to bud: <S%H6779><s%> I have ordained <S%H6186><s%> a lamp <S%H5216><s%> for mine anointed. <S%H4899><s%>
His enemies <S%H341><s%> will I clothe <S%H3847><s%> with shame: <S%H1322><s%> but upon <S%H5921><s%> himself shall his crown <S%H5145><s%> flourish. <S%H6692><s%>
